1.0 Initial release
- Create "Countdowns" that you want to track across a given time frame
- Not much more too it than that but I hope it can be useful for you

1.1 Formality
- Added privacy policy links in the app
- Usual bug fixes and improvements

1.2 Dark Mode
- Added support for dark mode
- Usual bug fixes and improvements

1.3 Whoops
- Fixed dark mode not applying to about screen
- Fixed google play store link

1.4
- Migrated settings to use proper settings structure
- Reordered settings into new categories
- Added some initial options for countdown types
- Updated utilities to 1.1.1, components to 2.0.0

1.5
- Added type labels on preview cars
- Added standard days support for countdown
- Updated components to 2.0.1
- Updated constraint layout to 2.0.0-beta6
- Updated progress bar to 1.0.1

2.0 Widgets
- Widget support! From your home screen see a snapshot of the current progress. Dark and light mode supported
- Updated some settings wording
- Updated about this app information

2.1
- Fixed minimum widget size for home screen on some phones
- Updated dependencies

2.2
- Added widget update date to widgets
- Added settings toggle for new widget update date to customise
- Fixed some typos throughout the modify screen

2.3
- Fixes days countdown type edge cases with some dates showing incorrect rounded number of days
- Fixed widget label for light mode / dark mode
- Updated google analytics to 17.4.3
- Updated google crashlytics to 17.0.1
- Updated material components to 1.3.0-alpha01
- Updated components to 2.1.0, utilities to 2.0.1

2.4
- Fixed a bug in the list where some new items wouldn\'t show
- Updated koin to 2.1.6

2.5
- Added yen, kg, g, l, ml, s, mm as countdown types
- Fixed theming issues in about this app section
- Updated crashlytics gradle to 2.2.0
- Updated crashlytics to 17.1.0
- Updated lifecycle dependencies to 2.3.0-alpha04
- Updated labelled-progress-bar to 1.0.3
- Updated contraintlayout to 2.0.0-beta7

2.5.1
- Added temperature scales
- Fixed some typos throughout the settings
- Updated firebase
- Updated contraintlayout to 2.0.0-beta8

2.6.0
- Added progress type switcher! Now choose between linear, accelerate, decelerate, and accelerate-decelerate progression types
- Fixed some typos throughout the settings

2.7.0
- General stability updates and bug fixes
- More typos fixed throughout. Tweaked widget adding screen

3.0.0
- Android R support
- New about this app screen
- Fixed some random crashes throughout the app

3.0.2
- Dependency updates
- Incredibly minor bug fixes

3.1.0
- Adds circular progress widget!
- Increases minimum support version to API 23

3.1.1
- Usual assortment of bug fixes and dependency updates

3.1.3
- Fixed edge case bug where sometimes last value in progress bar would not be accurate

3.1.4
- Minor bug fixes and dependency updates

This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.

If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

Information Collection and Use

For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way.

The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.

Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app

  • Google Play Services
  • Firebase Analytics
  • Crashlytics

Log Data

I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called a crash report. This crash report may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics. You can opt out of this crash reporting in the settings

Service Providers

I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

  • To facilitate our Service;
  • To provide the Service on our behalf;
  • To perform Service-related services; or
  • To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Security

I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security. I have taken steps to aid in this security, please feel free to email me if you wish me to provide more information (You can clicking "Have a suggestion?" in the feedback section in settings to start typing an email)

Links to Other Sites

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

Children’s Privacy

These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. I do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case I discover that a child under 13 has provided me with personal information, I immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact me so that I will be able to do necessary actions.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at thementalgoose@gmail.com about your issues. (You can clicking "Have a suggestion?" in the feedback section in settings to start typing an email)
